meanings.definition: Admit (someone) into a place or group alongside another person.
meanings.sent1: She coadmitted her friend to the party.
meanings.sent2: The teacher coadmitted the new student to the class.
meanings.sent3: The siblings coadmitted their pet cat to their secret club.
meanings.sent4: The two detectives coadmitted the suspect to their investigation.
meanings.sent5: The kind neighbor coadmitted the lost dog to their home.

meanings.definition: Admit (someone) to a hospital or other institution for treatment at the same time as another person.
meanings.sent1: The doctors coadmitted the twins for surgery.
meanings.sent2: They coadmitted the accident victims to the emergency room.
meanings.sent3: The hospital coadmitted the clown and the acrobat for their injuries.
meanings.sent4: The veterinarian coadmitted the injured dog and cat for treatment.
meanings.sent5: The rescue team coadmitted the hikers to the hospital after the avalanche.
